title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 304.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 304.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

Wherever used in this Part: (a) The term chancellor shall mean the
chancellor of State University of New York. (b) The term college shall mean any State
operated college, statutory or contract college, the Agricultural Experiment

Station at Geneva, or locally sponsored two-year colleges under the program of

State University other than a two-year college sponsored or administered by the
board of higher education of the City of New York. (c) The term chief administrative officer
shall mean the head of a college, whether called president, dean, provost, director or otherwise. (d) The term
professional service shall include any position in the unclassified service
pursuant to subdivision (h) or (i) of section
35
of the

Civil Service Law. (e) The term
retired person shall mean a retired member of a public retirement system or
pension plan administered by the State of New York, or any of its political
subdivisions, who is receiving a retirement allowance for other than physical
disability. (f) The term the act
shall mean the provisions of article 7 of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
304.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
